column5: Wonderfully appointed 1 bedroom bungalow home right in the heart of Montrose, a mere 5 minutes from Downtown, the Medical center and 10 minutes from the Galleria. Offering designer decor and quaint, quiet surroundings. You are in the Heart of Houston, while hiding From the hubbub of downtown. The home has been recently renovated while keep the charm of a '20's bungalow.
